features.title: Super-Genius Intelligence
features.copy: Tony Stark is far more than a mechanical engineering prodigy who graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology with honors at the age of 17.

features.title: Master Engineer
features.copy: He is an excellent engineer and mechanic capable of fixing almost any, if not all machinery.

features.title: Master Businessman
features.copy: Stark is extremely well-respected in the business world, able to command people's attentions when he speaks on economic matters.  He has built up several multi-million dollar companies from virtually nothing.

features.title: Expert Tactician
features.copy: He is a brilliant tactician capable of quickly formulating battle strategies and new plans if the situation changes, like being able to elaborate complex plans in order to defeat different enemies.
